name: The Psychic
description:
This is a survival game that under third person perspective. Players will play a witch who survives in the forest. In order to gain her magic power, She would never stop exploring or fighting.

FeaturesSpecial Ability
The witch has special gifts. She can use telekinesis to lift a stone or launch it like a bullet. She can also launch a fireball by the power that drawn from the undead.Get Power
The witch don't have all the power inborn.She needs to hunt all kinds of magical creatures to get special powers. Therefore, continuous exploration and fighting is necessary.Building System
Magic power can't let the witch out of all the dangers. It is necessary to build some fortifications. Players can control the witch to collect the building materials and build creative buildings.Environment
Foggy day often occurs in forests where the witch lives in. When the fog is heavy, the vision becomes very poor. Magical creatures will become more active in foggy weather at the same time.
